item.title: 阀门公司发布新型视频游戏控制台 Steam Machine
item.description:
备受欢迎的掌上游戏机 Steam Deck 背后的美国游戏公司正在为 PC 游戏打造一款客厅设备 

。【原文：

The US gaming company behind the popular, handheld Steam Deck is making a living-room device for PC games 

】

item.title: 法官称亚历山大兄弟必须面对性交易指控
item.description: 在法官驳回了寻求驳回对前豪华房地产经纪人塔尔-亚历山大（Tal Alexander）和奥伦-亚历山大（Oren Alexander）及其兄弟阿隆-亚历山大（Alon Alexander）的刑事指控的大部分辩护理由后，对他们的性交易指控可以继续进行。【原文：The prosecution of former luxury real estate brokers Tal and Oren Alexander and their brother Alon Alexander on sex-trafficking charges can proceed, after a judge rejected most of the defense arguments seeking to dismiss criminal allegations against them.】

item.title: 财政部长称意大利债务是未来评级的挑战
item.description: 财政部主任里卡多-巴尔比耶里（Riccardo Barbieri）表示，意大利受到评级公司的称赞，但可能会发现高债务限制了未来的评级上调。【原文：Italy is being lauded by ratings companies but may find high debt restrains future upgrades, according to Treasury chief Riccardo Barbieri.】

item.title: 亿万富翁萨德收购家乐福股份，半岛集团退出
item.description: 随着巴西半岛集团（Peninsula）出售股份，法国亿万富翁萨德（Saadé）家族正在成为连锁超市家乐福（Carrefour SA）的主要股东。【原文：France’s billionaire Saadé family is becoming an anchor shareholder in supermarket chain Carrefour SA, as Brazil’s Peninsula sells its stake.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：谷歌在新闻排名方面面临欧盟竞争调查
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引未具名官员的话报道称，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌在欧洲面临新一轮竞争调查，原因是谷歌在搜索结果中对新闻机构的排名方式。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google faces a fresh competition probe in Europe over the way it ranks news outlets in its search results, the Financial Times reported, citing unnamed officials.】

item.title: 贝森特承诺 "逐步 "改变债务发行方式
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）按照以往的惯例表示，财政部准备根据投资者需求模式的变化，改变其出售的美国国债类型，但任何改变都将是渐进的，以防止扰乱市场。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, in keeping with past practice, said his department is prepared to alter the types of US Treasury securities it sells in response to evolving patterns of investor demand, though any changes will be gradual in order to prevent roiling markets.】

item.title: Braskem 公司现金短缺，债权人在付款前忧心忡忡
item.description: 石油化工公司 Braskem Idesa SAPI 的现金储备在即将到来的票息支付前骤然减少，引发了投资者对拉美又一次企业崩溃的担忧。【原文：Investors are on edge as petrochemical firm Braskem Idesa SAPI’s cash reserves crumble ahead of a looming coupon payment, stoking fears of another corporate meltdown in Latin America.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称通胀仍是更明显、更紧迫的风险
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，通胀仍然是经济面临的更大风险，他赞成在央行明确有望实现2%的目标之前保持利率稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said inflation remains the greater risk to the economy, and he favors keeping rates steady until it is clear the central bank is on track to reach its 2% goal.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司面临爱尔兰媒体监管机构的调查
item.description: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 展开调查，称该公司未能删除用户举报的非法内容。【原文：Ireland’s media regulator has opened an investigation into Elon Musk’s social media platform X, saying that the company is failing to remove content users report as illegal.】

item.title: Vista 着眼于米莱改革，力争将阿根廷页岩油产量翻番
item.description: Vista Energy SAB 是阿根廷新兴页岩区的顶级钻井商之一，在自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在中期选举中取得决定性胜利后，该公司将哈维尔-米莱伊的新一轮改革视为实现增长的蹦床。【原文：Vista Energy SAB, one of the top drillers in Argentina’s burgeoning shale patch, sees another round of reforms from Javier Milei as a trampoline to growth after the libertarian president notched a decisive win in midterm elections.】

item.title: 高盛在 EA 上获得有史以来最大一笔付款，交易额逼近历史纪录
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s biggest-ever M&A payday may be the precursor to the bank’s best year for advisory work.】

item.title: ExodusPoint 的布勒加认为欧洲央行将两次降息，并喜欢欧盟债务
item.description: ExodusPoint 资本管理公司预计欧洲央行将在明年上半年再降息两次。【原文：ExodusPoint Capital Management expects the European Central Bank to cut interest rates twice more in the first half of next year — a contrarian call given markets favor no more reductions.】

item.title: 倍耐力的特隆凯蒂希望解决中国股东之争
item.description: 倍耐力执行副董事长Marco Tronchetti Provera表示，倍耐力与第一大股东中化控股有限公司（Sinochem Holdings Corp.【原文：Pirelli & C. SpA expects its governance issues with top shareholder Sinochem Holdings Corp. to be resolved, lifting a threat that’s clouded the tire maker’s US prospects, Executive Vice Chairman Marco Tronchetti Provera said.】

item.title: 印度批准向受美国严厉关税打击的出口商提供 50 亿美元援助
item.description: 就在两国继续努力达成贸易协议之际，印度宣布为遭受美国高额关税打击的出口商提供价值超过 50 亿美元的救济措施。【原文：India announced relief measures worth more than $5 billion for its exporters pummeled by steep US tariffs, even as the two nations continue working toward a trade deal.】

item.title: Meta 承诺出资 10 亿美元在威斯康星州建设人工智能数据中心
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司将斥资 10 亿多美元在威斯康星州建立一个数据中心，为人工智能工作提供支持，这是该公司对快速发展的人工智能竞赛所需的基础设施进行的最新投资。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is spending more than $1 billion to build a data center in Wisconsin that will power artificial intelligence work, its latest investment in the infrastructure needed for the fast-moving AI race.】

item.title: Waymo 在高速公路上推出无人驾驶 Robotaxis，这在美国尚属首次
item.description: Waymo 将成为美国第一家在高速公路上提供无人驾驶出租车服务的机器人出租车提供商，这是一个里程碑，使其能够更好地与打车公司和传统出租车服务竞争。【原文：Waymo will become the first robotaxi provider in the US to offer driverless rides on highways, a milestone that positions it to better compete with ride-hailing companies and traditional taxi services.】

item.title: 交易员加大对美国数据下滑的押注引发国债反弹
item.description: 由于一系列数据可能会重塑美国经济的前景，债券交易员们纷纷买入国债期权，目标是在未来几周内将 10 年期国债收益率降至 4% 以下。【原文：Bond traders are piling into Treasury options targeting a drop in the 10-year yield below 4% in coming weeks, as a cascade of data could reshape the outlook for the US economy.】

item.title: 亚马逊新款 Echo Show 将显示屏与 Alexa+ 相结合：上手体验
item.description: 在上个月发布了一对经过改良的 Echo 扬声器之后，亚马逊公司又推出了最新的智能显示器。Echo Show 8（180 美元）和 Echo Show 11（220 美元）现已上市，它们采用了更时尚、更现代的设计。【原文：After releasing a pair of revamped Echo speakers last month, Amazon.com Inc. is following those up with its latest smart displays. The Echo Show 8 ($180) and Echo Show 11 ($220) are available now, bringing with them a much sleeker, more modern design.】

item.title: Anthropic 承诺出资 500 亿美元在美国建设人工智能数据中心
item.description: Anthropic PBC 计划斥资 500 亿美元，在美国德克萨斯州和纽约州等地建立人工智能工作定制数据中心，这是为支持人工智能热潮而对基础设施做出的最新昂贵承诺。【原文：Anthropic PBC plans to spend $50 billion to build custom data centers for artificial intelligence work in several US locations, including Texas and New York, the latest expensive pledge for infrastructure to support the AI boom.】

item.title: 亚特兰大联储博斯蒂克将于 2 月任期届满时退休
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）宣布，他计划在今年 2 月本届任期结束时退休。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic announced he plans to retire at the end of his current term in February.】

item.title: 英国天然气出口跃升，贸易商利用欧洲更广泛的价格优势
item.description: 英国本周增加了对欧盟的天然气出口，因为充足的供应使贸易商得以利用欧洲大陆不断扩大的现货溢价。【原文：Britain boosted natural gas exports to the European Union this week, as ample supplies allowed traders to take advantage of a widening premium for spot prices on the continent.】

item.title: 美国股市上涨，因科技股反弹和关门投票增加乐观情绪
item.description: 美国股市周三延续涨势，科技股反弹助推主要股指走高，对有史以来最长的政府关门结束的乐观情绪也助推主要股指走高。【原文：US equities extended gains on Wednesday as a rally in tech stocks helped push key indexes higher and optimism over an end to the longest government shutdown on record helped push key indexes higher.】

item.title: 法国财政部长表示 "非常有信心 "通过预算案
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，他对政府能够通过分裂的国民议会获得预算越来越有信心。【原文：France’s finance minister, Roland Lescure, said he’s growing in confidence that the government can get a budget though a fractured National Assembly.】

item.title: 250 亿美元的比特币赌注因大买家的怀疑而岌岌可危
item.description: 比特币正努力从 3 300 亿美元的大坑中爬出来，曾经推动其上升的力量正在退却。【原文：Bitcoin is struggling to climb out of a $330 billion hole, and the forces that once powered its ascent are in retreat.】

item.title: Airbnb 将测试在其应用程序中增加 Instacart 杂货配送服务
item.description: Airbnb 公司正在与 Instacart 合作测试一项新服务，让美国一些租赁房屋的客人可以在入住前和入住期间通过房屋共享应用程序订购杂货。【原文：Airbnb Inc. is testing a new service with Instacart that will let guests at some US rentals order groceries through the home-sharing app ahead of and during their stay.】

item.title: 伊朗失踪的铀引发联合国核监察机构的关注
item.description: 根据联合国核监察机构发布的一份新报告，伊朗对其被以色列和美国轰炸的地点所造成的损失保持沉默，这加剧了人们对伊斯兰共和国近炸弹级铀库存的状况和位置的担忧。【原文：Iran’s silence over damage it incurred at sites bombed by Israel and the US is fueling concern about the state and location of the Islamic Republic’s near-bomb-grade uranium inventory, according to a new report issued by the United Nations nuclear watchdog.】

item.title: Merz Advisers 将 2026 年德国经济增长预测下调至 1%以下
item.description: 弗里德里希-梅尔茨的顾问们将德国明年的经济增长预期下调到了1%以下，这凸显了德国总理在恢复欧洲最大经济体有意义的扩张方面所面临的巨大挑战。【原文：Friedrich Merz’s advisers trimmed their German growth forecast for next year to below 1%, underscoring the scale of challenge the chancellor faces in restoring meaningful expansion to Europe’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚保持利率不变，为政治和市场动荡的一年画上句号
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行在今年的最后一次政策会议上维持利率不变，在这一年里，这个黑海国家经历了深刻的政治危机和市场动荡。【原文：Romania’s central bank held interest rates unchanged at the last policy meeting of a year in which the Black Sea nation endured a deep political crisis and market turmoil.】

item.title: Whoop 首席执行官表示考虑在未来两年内上市
item.description: 广受欢迎的无屏幕健身手环制造商 Whoop 公司正着眼于在未来两年内进行首次公开募股，并正在探索在其健康追踪平台上增加葡萄糖监测功能。【原文：Whoop Inc., the maker of popular screen-less fitness bands, is eyeing an initial public offering as soon as in the next two years and is exploring adding glucose monitoring to its health-tracking platform.】

item.title: 欧佩克第三季度石油市场观点因美国经济增长而转向顺差
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）对第三季度全球石油市场的预期从赤字转为盈余，原因是美国产量超出预期，而该组织本身也增加了供应。【原文：OPEC flipped estimates for global oil markets in the third quarter from a deficit to a surplus, as US production exceeded expectations while the group itself ramped up supplies.】
